properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM NORMALBOARD WHERE USER_ADMIN = 'Y' OR USER_ADMIN = NULL

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT BOARD_NO , CATEGORY_NAME , COUNT , CREATE_BOARD , NBOARD_TITLE , USER_NAME FROM NORMALBOARD N JOIN CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_NO) JOIN MEMBER ON (USER_NOM = USER_NO) WHERE N.USER_ADMIN = 'Y' ORDER BY CREATE_BOARD DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
